metadata.title: CVE-2020-27768 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In ImageMagick, there is an outside the range of representable values of type 'unsigned int' at MagickCore/quantum-private.h. This flaw affects ImageMagick versions prior to 7.0.9-0.

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
